text: CompUSA was a computer retailer headquartered in Dallas, Texas. It was founded in 1984 as Soft Warehouse. At their height they operated approximately 230 locations. They closed 126 stores in 2007. They closed another 103 stores in March 2008. It was owned by Systemax from 2008-2012. They ceased CompUSA physical operations in November 2012. The 2012 locations operated as TigerDirect from 2012-2015. ==Related pages== *The Good Guys! *Circuit City *Egghead Software *Fry's Electronics *Micro Center *Tower Records ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1984 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Texas Category:Computers
title: CompUSA
